name: Signature Hoodie
description: Crafted for comfort and bold style, our hoodie is your go-to for streetwear swagger. Made with premium cotton blend, it features a relaxed fit, bold logo print, and durable stitching.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low, do not iron print.
